Package webd4201.sturchflintn

Class Mark

java.lang.Object
webd4201.sturchflintn.Mark
public class Mark
extends java.lang.Object
Mark class that doesn't extend anything will act as a storage for grades from Faculty, for Students
Since:
1.0 (January 8th, 2021)
